divs: sighting detailsi was taking some sky snapshots in the field next to my house and caught this disk shape object in one of the pictures. at the time i decided not to report it(4\8\06) but now about three weeks later i have changed my mind. in the original there is a tree limb in one corner of the picture which will give you some idea at what angle the camer was pointed in an upward direction. it was also in a roughly nw direction also. i am enclosing the original and an enlargement.
trends: There have been 96 other sightings in Wilmington
There were no other sightings in Wilmington on or around April 8th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Picture taken of disk in sky
